::Magmatron::

    He was now looking at the bot in the eyes (Magma is also=
 16 feet) He knew that the bot could take him on physically, that seemed to=
 be his strong point. But there was no chance of Like-Like overpowering him=
 mentaly, he simply could not. Magmatron liked this, it could work into his=
 plans to have a really powerful fighter on his side.
    "So, what else ca=
n you do?" Magmatron asked. "As in weapons."

  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, =
February 03, 2001 5:57 PM
  Subject: Re: Destron's have a visitor...


  Li=
ke-Like understood, because Magmatron was talking, and Like-Like payed care=
ful attention. So he transformed, remembering his robot mode. He was a hulk=
ing zombie looking thing. About 16 feet tall, very much bigger in robot mod=
e...

ahoogroups.com

 Re: Destron's have a visitor...


    ::Magmatron::

        "Always," He =
said simply. " I wonder if I could see your robot mode?"
